name: Contractors Santa Monica
tag_list: contractors-santa-monica, contracting-company-santa-monica, general-contractors-santa-monica-ca, licensed-contractors-santa-monica, professional-contractors-santa-monica, construction-company-santa-monica, home-remodeling-santa-monica, household-remodelin
overview:
In today’s construction field, Contractors Santa Monica provides and performs many services. We have delivered an array of projects on-time and with the quality our customers deserve. Our general contractors believe that many decisions, speculations and details are needed to ensure the integrity and outcome of our client’s projects throughout all stages of the building process. We incorporate each project into a scheduled plan. Our main objective is to deliver well suited services and reasonable prices with the quality of our clients demand.

Our general contractors are best recognized in California for the unique twist and innovation designs in which we build and remodel for several properties. Starting with the pre-design stage to the final product, we oversee all aspects of the renovation projects.

The following are the services that we provide for our customers: Residential Services:

  • New Construction
  • Custom Home Building
  • Room Addition
  • Home Renovation
  • Kitchen Remodeling
  • Bathroom Remodeling
  • Deck Building
  • Patio and Car Ports
  • General Repairs

Commercial Services:

  • Steel and Concrete Construction
  • Renovations
  • Tenant Improvement
  • Office Space
  • Restaurants
  • Structural Repair

Needless to say, planning and preparation have been the key elements in our success. With a dedicated and experienced team, we have an outstanding capability to successful working habits with limited time frames. Cost-effective solutions that display a high regard for your budget is something we strive for. To make the renovation easy and simple, our licensed contractors deliver zenith quality and durability. Contact us for a fast response and allow us to make your dreams come true with a perfect remodeling job.

Call us at: (310) 622-4161
